text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Vero Beach, Florida |official_name = |nickname = The Hibiscus City |settlement_type = City |motto = Where the Tropics Begin |image_skyline = Conn Beach- Vero Beach.JPG |image_caption = Vero Beach Boardwalk in October 2009 |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_map = Indian_River_County_Florida_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Vero_Beach_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250x200px |map_caption = Location in Indian River County and the state of Florida |pushpin_map = Florida#USA |pushpin_map_caption = Location in Florida##Location in the United States |pushpin_label = Vero Beach |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Indian River |government_type = Commission-Manager |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = Settled |established_date = 1870 |established_title2 = Incorporated (Vero) |established_date2 = 1919 |established_title3 = |established_date3 = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_sq_mi = 13.40 |area_land_sq_mi = 11.50 |area_water_sq_mi = 1.91 |area_water_percent = 14.31 |area_metro_sq_mi = |population_as_of = 2020 |population_note = Census Bureau |population_footnotes = |population_total = 16354 |population_density_sq_mi = 1422.21 |population_metro = 159,788 |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |timezone = Eastern (EST) |utc_offset = -5 |timezone_DST = EDT |utc_offset_DST = -4 |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 4 |elevation_ft = 13 |postal_code_type = ZIP codes |postal_code = 32960 thru 32969 |area_code = 772 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 12-74150 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 0292760 |website = http://www.covb.org |area_total_km2 = 34.72 |area_land_km2 = 29.78 |area_water_km2 = 4.93 |population_density_km2 = 549.10 }} Vero Beach is a city of Florida in the United States.
